title: [K-12] Task Constraint-Based Hurdles Running Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational track and field skills and physical control abilities
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based video analysis combined with offline practical training, focusing on individual exercise pattern documentation

learning_goals: Learners can adjust the takeoff point in a 5-step hurdle race forward by at least 30 cm
Learners can optimize hurdle clearance movements by increasing horizontal velocity by 0.2 m/s
Learners can achieve a 15% reduction in stride variability after 18 weeks of training

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
